text: 36:6 Jeremaia 25:1-38; 36:1-32; 45:1-5; Daniel 1:1-2Jehoiakim Judabar atrivimɨn itir dughiamɨn, Babilonian Atrivim Nebukatnesar uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko iza Judan kantri mɨsosi. Egha Nebukatnesar me abɨragha Atrivim Jehoiakimɨn suiragha kalabuziar gumazimɨn mɨn senbar a ikegha, a inigha Babilonɨn nguibar ekiamɨn ghu.
